mapper.select: SELECT E.*,T.*,D.* FROM employee E LEFT JOIN title T ON E.title=T.tcode LEFT JOIN department D ON E.dno=D.dcode ORDER BY eno
SELECT E.*,T.*,D.* FROM employee E LEFT JOIN title T ON E.title=T.tcode LEFT JOIN department D ON E.dno=D.dcode WHERE E.eno=#{eno}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO employee( ename, salary, dno, gender, joindate, title ) VALUES ( #{ename}, #{salary}, #{department.dcode}, #{gender}, #{joindate}, #{title.tcode} )
mapper.update: UPDATE employee SET ename=#{ename}, salary=#{salary}, dno=#{department.dcode}, gender=#{gender}, joindate=#{joindate}, title=#{title.tcode} WHERE eno=#{eno}
